data.name: Macquarie Property Versatile
data.description: Residentially secured loan for more complex borrowing structures.

features.additionalInfo: Flexible repayment structures. Interest Only, Principal & Interest and Principal + Interest repayment types available. Maximum Interest Only loan term of 5 years, subject to credit approval.

Global Facility Limit is available. Provides greater flexibility to investors as a variety of borrowers may drawdown under the same loan limit. This is only available on a maximum Interest Only term of 5 years. Please note that Independent Legal Advice/Independent Financial Advice (ILA/IFA) is required for individual borrowers.
Equity release. Equity release available for a range of borrowing purposes, subject to approval.

Sub-accounts available. Set up multiple sub accounts to draw down on the overarching facility limit. All sub-accounts are required to be on the same interest rate and repayment type. Except for Global Facility Limits, all sub-accounts must have the same regulated/non-regulated loan purpose as the overarching facility.
Relationship servicing. Dedicated relationship team who specialise in different industries and can provide tailored solutions and industry information.

constraints.additionalInfo: Maximum loan term of 30 years. Maximum Interest Only loan term of 5 years applies if a Global Facility Limit is selected.
Maximum LVR of 80% dependent on location and value of security.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Borrowers must be Individual, Company, Partnership, Trust
Security must be a residential property or cash.

Maximum LVR. Medical Professionals. General Practitioners: 3-3.5x EBITDA, or 70% of external valuation. Up to 1 year interest only per new acquisition, amortising over 10 years. Day and Short Stay Hospitals: 3-3.5x EBITDA, or 70% of external valuation. Up to 1 year interest only per new acquisition, amortising over 10 years. Diagnostic: 3-3.5x EBITDA, or 70% of external valuation. Maximum repayment term of 10 years (or aligned to Medicare license/obsolescence of any key equipment/premises lease terms). Engineers, Architects, Planners, Surveyors, associated service providers in Built Environment: up to 3.0x EBITDA subject to business size and number of guarantors. Legal: For 2 partners, up to 1x yearly stablised earnings per partner (capped at $500k per partner). For 3 partners, up to 1x yearly stabilised earnings per partner (capped at $1m per partner). Accounting: The lower of: a. Up to 3.5x EBITDA (additional debt to EBITDA limits apply above $1mil b. 70% of recurring fees c. Up to $2m debt per guarantor. Financial Planning: Up to 3.75x EBITDA. Insurance Broking: a. For recurring revenue ≤$750k, up to 67% of asset value determined by internal Macquarie Multiplier and amortising b. For recurring revenue >$750k, up to 3.75x EBITDA. Real Estate: Up to a maximum of 70% of rent roll value determined by internal Macquarie Multiplier (no cost to client) and must amortise to 60% within 3 years. Strata: a. Where lots under management ≤5,000, up to a maximum of 70% of strata roll value and must amortise to 60% within 3 years b. Where lots under management >5,000, up to 4.5x EBITDA c. Business Valuations determined by internal Macquarie Multiplier (no cost to client).
Minimum loan sizes apply and will vary depending on a variety of factors. Contact us if you’d like more information.

fees.name: Establishment fee
fees.additionalInfo: Individual: $1,000. Corporate Borrowers: up to 0.5% of limit.

fees.name: Valuation fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if any valuation is required in respect to any security property.

fees.name: Other Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Other additional fees and charges may apply. Please refer to the Estimate of Costs which will be issued with the approved loan documents.
